data.content:
noun
plural ~ lines
[count] :a line of soldiers who are shooting at an enemy
a brave soldier who was never far behind the firing line
[singular] :a place or position in which someone is not protected from attack or criticism - used especially in the phrase (US) on the firing line or Brit in the firing line
School administrators are not on the firing line every day like the teachers are.

Danh từ
chiến tuyến, tuyến lửa
be in the firing line
chịu sự phê bình khiển trách do trách nhiệm hoặc cương vị của mình
she'll have to be careful now – she's directly in the firing-line of the new director
chị ta bây giờ phải thận trọng vì chịu sự phê bình trực tiếp của ông giám đốc mới
